GLBuffer - Class in jrtr.gldeferredrenderer
A simple class for creating, reading, and writing to an OpenGL framebuffer object (FBO).
GLBuffer(GL3, int, int, int, boolean, int) - Constructor for class jrtr.gldeferredrenderer.GLBuffer
Creates a new OpenGL framebuffer object (FBO).
GLBuffer(GL3, int, int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class jrtr.gldeferredrenderer.GLBuffer
Creates a new OpenGL framebuffer object (FBO) with a default GL3.GL_RGB8 format.
GLDeferredRenderContext - Class in jrtr.gldeferredrenderer
